mapper.select: select t.id, t.username, t.password, t.nickname, t.is_enabled, p.code as "permission.code" from sys_user t left join system_user_role ur on ur.user_id = t.id left join system_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id left join system_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where t.is_deleted = ${@cn.koala.persist.domain.YesNo@NO.value} and t.username = #{username}
